an7.70:4.1: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an7.70:4.2: “kiṃ nu kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyyā”ti?
an7.70:4.4: “satthāraṃ kho, bhikkhu, sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyya.
an7.70:4.10: paṭisanthāraṃ kho, bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyyā”ti.
an7.70:5.2: “ime kho me dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, yannūnāhaṃ ime dhamme gantvā bhagavato āroceyyaṃ.
an7.70:5.3: Evaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasaṅkhātatarā ca.
an7.70:5.4: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ adhigaccheyya parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ.
an7.70:5.6: ‘ayaṃ kho me suvaṇṇanikkho parisuddho pariyodāto, yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ gantvā kammārānaṃ dasseyyaṃ.
an7.70:5.7: Evaṃ me ayaṃ suvaṇṇanikkho sakammāragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasaṅkhātataro ca.
an7.70:5.8: Evamevaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, yannūnāhaṃ ime dhamme gantvā bhagavato āroceyyaṃ.
an7.70:5.9: Evaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasaṅkhātatarā cā’”ti.
an7.70:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.70:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.70:7.1: “Idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
an7.70:7.2: ‘kiṃ nu kho bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyyā’ti?
an7.70:7.3: Atha kho tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, etadahosi:
an7.70:7.4: ‘satthāraṃ kho bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyya.
an7.70:7.8: Atha kho tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, etadahosi:
an7.70:7.9: ‘ime kho me dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, yannūnāhaṃ ime dhamme gantvā bhagavato āroceyyaṃ.
an7.70:7.10: Evaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasaṅkhātatarā ca.
an7.70:7.11: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ adhigaccheyya parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ.
an7.70:7.13: ayaṃ kho me suvaṇṇanikkho parisuddho pariyodāto, yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ gantvā kammārānaṃ dasseyyaṃ.
an7.70:7.14: Evaṃ me ayaṃ suvaṇṇanikkho sakammāragato parisuddho ceva bhavissati parisuddhasaṅkhātataro ca.
an7.70:7.15: Evamevaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā pariyodātā, yannūnāhaṃ ime dhamme gantvā bhagavato āroceyyaṃ.
an7.70:7.16: Evaṃ me ime dhammā parisuddhā ceva bhavissanti parisuddhasaṅkhātatarā cā’”ti.
an7.70:8.2: Satthāraṃ kho, sāriputta, bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyya.
an7.70:8.3: Dhammaṃ kho, sāriputta, bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyya.
an7.70:8.8: paṭisanthāraṃ kho, sāriputta, bhikkhu sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharanto akusalaṃ pajaheyya, kusalaṃ bhāveyyā”ti.
an7.70:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.70:9.2: “imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
an7.70:9.3: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme sagāravo bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an7.70:9.4: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhammepi so agāravo.
an7.70:10.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghe sagāravo bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an7.70:10.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghepi so agāravo. (3)
an7.70:11.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghe agāravo sikkhāya sagāravo bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an7.70:11.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghe agāravo sikkhāyapi so agāravo. (4)
an7.70:12.1: So vata, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghe agāravo sikkhāya agāravo samādhismiṃ sagāravo bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an7.70:12.2: Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu satthari agāravo dhamme agāravo saṅghe agāravo sikkhāya agāravo samādhismimpi so agāravo. (5)
